title: A Cats Steampunk Alphabet
description: A is for Airship, for flying is keen. B is for Boiler, turning water to steam. A Cats Steampunk Alphabet is for the velocipede lover in all of us ... seen through cunning feline eyes! About the artists G. D. Falksen is an author, lecturer, public speaker, MC, and man about town. He is the author of The Hellfire Chronicles and The Ouroboros Cycle. You can find out all you ever wanted to know about the man who wrote this alphabet at www.gdfalksen.com Evelyn Kriete is an editor, artist, fashion designer, event producer, and a lot of other things. It is said that she does, in fact, sleep and eat, but to date these claims are merely rumors. To find out more about the artist who made these cats steampunk go to www.jaborwhalky.net Jay Lake is an award-winning author of over ten novels, with more than 300 short stories in print. In spite of his busy schedule, he finds time to inspire the creation of alphabet books for the betterment of humankind. More information about him can be found at www.jlake.com
author: G.D. Falksen
